tool_description: EmojiGen is an API that allows you to generate random emojis or emojis based on specific themes effortlessly. With EmojiGen, you can add a touch of fun and emotion to your applications, messages, and content.
name: EmojiGen
title: EmojiGen

api_list.name: postEmoji
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emojigen.p.rapidapi.com/api/genemoji"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emojigen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://emojigen.p.rapidapi.com/api/genemoji"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emojigen.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
